data.title: Gran Turismo Sardinia 2025 - a supercar tour on Sardinia - Ferrari or Lamborghini included
data.meta_description: 19-26 September 2025 @ Sardinia, Italy. Welcome to a six-day luxury supercar tour in Sardinia. The best driving roads on the planet. Start and finish is on Costa Smeralda. A Ferrari or Lamborghini is included.
data.text:
Welcome to the best roads on the planet

We immediately fell in love After going to Sardinia in 2020. The hotel is amazing, the water is ultra-clear, and all the roads are fantastic. This is heaven for driving a Ferrari or Lamborghini.

It is also here we found SS125 Orientale Sarda, the best road we have ever driven. And we have been exploring Europe with supercars for two decades now. SS125 is that good. It will take your breath away.

The event starts in Grand Hotel Poltu Quatu and ends at the legendary Cala di Volpe in Costa Smeralda. The James Bond movie The Spy Who Loved Me made the hotel famous. Many of the locations from the movie you will recognise on this tour, including the beach where James appeared with his submarine white Lotus Esprit.

The hotel selection for 2024

All hotels en route are iconic heavyweight luxury venues. Here is the hotel selection for our 2025 tour:

Grand Hotel Poltu Quatu *****L (Costa SMeralda)

Su Gologone **** (Oliena)

Palazzo Tirso ***** (Cagliari)

Il Arenas resort ***** (Narbolia)

Il Faro Hotel & Spa **** (Alghero)

Cala di Volpe *****L (Costa Smeralda, two nights)

Seven days on tour

We make a full lap of Sardinia, driving the top roads of the Island and staying in the best hotels. Starting from Poltu Quatu in the northeastern corner, we drive south along the coast to Cala Gonone and then to the extremely cosy Su Gologone Hotel.

The following day, we continue south over a spectacular mountain pass and stay at the beautiful boutique hotel Palazzo Tirso in Cagliari. Then, we drive north on the west coast, with overnight stops in Narbolia and Alghero, before completing the loop and returning to Cala di Volpe for the final two nights.

The event is seven days. In total, we will drive a staggering 1 050 kilometres on spectacular roads, doing a full lap of the Island from Poltu Quatu to Cala di Volpe in Costa Smeralda. The best part? A Ferrari or Lamborghini is included.

Supercar included

You bet! We have organised 20 supercars for this event. It is a selection of Ferrari and Lamborghini cars. You can find the entire list below. You can also join with your own supercar.

Event schedule

Each day will be roughly five hours of driving. Sometimes less, sometimes a bit more. Besides driving, we will make stops for special activities and events along the road, like vista points, photo opportunities and other things.

The schedule for each day is breakfast at 9.00, start driving at 10.00, lunch en route, coffee break during the afternoon, arrival at the hotel late afternoon, aperitivo at 19:00 and dinner at 20.00.

Friday 19 September - Welcome to Costa Smeralda

Welcome to Sardinia and Costa Smeralda. It is the most beautiful place on the planet. When arriving at Hotel Poltu Quatu, you will check into the hotel and the event. The supercar you have chosen will be waiting for you just outside the lobby. If you arrive early, there is plenty of time to take your car for a spin.

At 19:00, we will have a welcome mingle in the hotel. After a short drivers briefing, we will have our opening dinner at Aruana Churrascaria, an award-winning Brazilian steakhouse.

15:00 - Check-in opens in Grand Hotel Poltu Quatu *****

19:00 - Welcome mingle in the hotel

20:00 - Dinner at Aruana Churrascaria

Saturday 20 September - Drive along the coast to Su Gologone

Today, the driving starts. After breakfast, we start our road trip by following the east coast southward.

Our first stop is in the village of Cala Gonone. We have lunch in the excellent seafood restaurant, Il Pescatore, in the harbour before driving to Hotel Su Gologne, nearby.

Arriving in the early afternoon, there is plenty of time to hang out by the gigantic pool before we have aperitivo and dinner. You can also spend the afternoon in the jacuzzi on your hotel room terrace with a bottle of prosecco. We have delicious local food and wine tonight, with a great view of the valleys below.

9:00 - Breakfast

10:00 - Driving starts

11:00 - Coastal roads

12:00 - Lunch in Cala Gonone

14:00 - Driving continues

15:00 - Arrival at Hotel Su Gologone ****

19:00 - Aperitivo on the hotel terrace

20:00 - Dinner in the restaurant

Sunday 21 September - SS125 Orientale Sarda

Are you ready for the best driving experience ever? Welcome to SS125 Orientale Sarda. A road that will astonish you with driving euphoria. This is the best supercar road in the world.

For lunch, we will stop in the village of Arbatax. After lunch, we continue over the mountains for more spectacular driving going to the southern part of the Island.

The hotel for the night is Palazzo Tirso, a five-star boutique hotel in the harbour of Cagliari.

9:00 - Breakfast

10:00 - Driving starts

11:00 - SS125 Orientale Sarda euphoria

12:30 - Lunch in Arbatax

14:00 - Driving continues

15:00 - Mountain pass madness

17:00 - Arrival at Palazzo Tirso ***** in Cagliari

19:00 - Aperitivo on the hotel terrace

20:00 - Dinner in the hotel

Monday 22 September - West coast to Narbolia

Good morning! You are in driving heaven. Today, we follow the west coast towards the Island's northwestern corner.

We start by driving to the village of Iglesias, where the excitement begins. Up the mountains we go again, with endless serpentines and lots of fun.

Lunch will be on the way, and then we go towards Narbolia. Here, we check in to Il Arenas Resort, just on the coast. Like every night, we start with aperitivo by the hotel pool. Later, dinner outside, watching the sunset.

9:00 - Breakfast

1000 - Driving starts

11:00 - Iglesias mountain pass

13:00 - Lunch

14:30 - Driving continues

15:30 - Arrival at Il Arenas Resort *****

19:00 - Aperitivo by the pool

20:00 - Dinner on the hotel terrace facing the sea

Tuesday 23 September - West coast to Alghero

Today, we follow the west coast towards the northwestern corner of the Island. We start after lunch since driving is only two hours long. You can relax and enjoy the pool or sea.

The last part we drive is the famous SP105 between the village of Bosa and the city of Alghero. This road is almost as good as the SS125 we drove yesterday.

In Alghero we check-in to El Faro Hotel & Spa, where we stay the night. Like every night, we start with aperitivo by the hotel pool. Later, dinner outside, watching the sunset.

9:00 - Breakfast

11:00 - Brunch in the hotel

13:00 - Driving starts

14:00 - SP105 Bosa to Alghero coastal road

15:00 - Arrival at El Faro Hotel ****

19:00 - Aperitivo by the pool

20:00 - BBQ dinner on the hotel terrace facing the sea

Wednesday 24 September - Northern Sardinia to Costa Smeralda

Today, we complete the lap around the Island. Some of the greatest roads in Sardinia remain. First, we drive to Castelsardo and have lunch in the amazing seafood Ristorante l'Incantu , situated on the side of a mountain with a fantastic view of the city and sea below.

After lunch, we drive three great roads in an east direction. First SS132 Strada Castel Sardo, then the more relaxed SP38 Via Sant'Antonio . The last road we drive is the fast and entertaining road SS427 Strada della Gallura before arriving at Cala di Volpe.

Congratulations! You made it. A complete lap of Sardinia driving some of the best roads in the world. Tonight we have aperitivo and dinner in the harbour of Porto Cervo. The restaurant selected for this evening is the awarded Al Pescatore. The setting is beautiful and is at a prime location in the harbour.

10:00 - Breakfast

11:00 - Driving starts

12:30 - Lunch at Ristorante I'incantu

14:30 - Driving continues

16:00 - SS132, SP38 and then SS427. Enjoy!

17:00 - Arrival at Hotel Cala di Volpe *****L

19:00 - Aperitivo in Porto Cervo

20:00 - Dinner in Al Pescatore

Thursday 25 September - Cala di Volpe

Today, we relax in one of the most beautiful places in Italy. The fantastic Cala di Volpe hotel is yours to enjoy if you wish to relax by the pool or seaside, or you can explore the area and the gorgeous Porto Cervo seaside town. Lunch will be served at the pool at 13:00, and later dinner in the hotel at 20:00

10:00 - Breakfast

13:00 - Lunch by the pool

19:00 - Aperitivo

20:00 - Closing dinner at the hotel

Friday 26 September - Thank you

Thank you for joining us at Gran Turismo Sardinia. The check-out time from the hotel is at noon. Please let us know if you want to stay longer.

Shuttles will be organised from the hotel to the airport in Olbia. Let us know when your flight leaves, and we will accommodate you.
